articles.author: Tim Baker, news reporter
articles.title: Perseverance: NASA's rover takes 11 million earthling names to Mars - Sky News
articles.description: The names of 284,350 people from the UK were among the names from 250 countries and territories travelling to the red planet.

articles.author: Ian Randall
articles.title: Pompeii: Scientists use lasers to remove stains on 2,000-year-old fresco in the House of the Ceii - Daily Mail
articles.description: Poor maintenance since the house was dug up in 1913-14 saw the hunting fresco and others deteriorate, particularly at the bottom, which is more vulnerable to humidity.
articles.content:
A stunning fresco in the garden of Pompeii's Casa dei Ceii (House of the Ceii) has been painstakingly laser-cleaned and touched up with new paint by expert restorers.

articles.title: Asteroid dust linked to Chicxulub crater confirms dinosaur extinction theory - The Times
articles.description: The case of what killed the dinosaurs has finally been closed. Scientists now have evidence definitively linking their extinction to an asteroid seven miles wide that hurtled into the Earth about 66

articles.author: Dan Avery
articles.title: Moment fish drowns a baby bird in a nest that flooded in Georgia - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a video from a Georgia salt marsh, a baby sparrow in a flooded nest is preyed on by a fish. The killer pulls the hatchling under the water and thrashes it around in its mouth until it drowns.
articles.content:
A researcher caught a harrowing encounter in a Georgia salt marsh when a fish pulled a baby sparrow down to a watery grave.
Seaside sparrows usually balance their nests in the marsh grass, but resea… [+4006 chars]
